ProductDecompEnrichmentRule.name: ProductDecompEnrichmentRule
ProductDecompEnrichmentRule.description: Represents mappings between fields and attributes. Enrichment rules are part of a decomposition rule, and are used to propagate data to fulfillment order lines.

CalculationDefinitionId.description: An expression set or a decision matrix that calculates the destination value.

DecompositionRuleId.description: The identifier of the decomposition rule.

DestinationApiName.description: The API name of the destination field or attribute code of an attribute.

DestinationAttributeIdentifier.description: The destination entity attribute that is mapped from the source entity attribute. This field can store a Salesforce AttributeDefinition ID or an external identifier. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

DestinationContextTag.description: The name of the destination context definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record

Name.description: The name of the decomposition rule.

RuleEnforcement.description: Specifies whether the rule applies to all fulfillment requests or only to specific ones.

SourceApiName.description: The API name of the source field or attribute code of an attribute.

SourceAttributeIdentifier.description: The source entity attribute that is mapped to the destination entity attribute. This field can store a Salesforce AttributeDefinition ID or an external identifier. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

SourceContextTag.description: The source type for the context definition.
